channel.title: [FIXED] number format exception error...NEED SERIOUS HELP! [FIXED]
channel.description:
when i run my server using any bat file i get this error:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "9 557 1" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:458) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:499) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:2960) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:24) at server.main(server.java:30)
i just ignore it and try to log in but it says i am already connected, which im not. anyone know how to fix this?

item.title: [FIXED] number format exception error...NEED SERIOUS HELP! [FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @attk_mast3r attk mast3r
item.description:
@attk_mast3r wrote:

ty deathschaos9 instead of using the spacebar i used tab just like u said and it worked! tysm!

Read full topic

item.title: [FIXED] number format exception error...NEED SERIOUS HELP! [FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

In your autospawn.cfg in config folder, look for those numbers, you added an them using spaces instead of tabbing.

Read full topic

item.title: [FIXED] number format exception error...NEED SERIOUS HELP! [FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @pl0x15 pl0x15
item.description:
@pl0x15 wrote:

go to the files it specifies such as (sevrer.java:(line#) and go to the line number it specifies which is after file name seperated by the colon like this::

server.java:343

thats the folder server.java(the notepad) and count down to line 343. or u can use goto Ctrl+G and type 343. I think.

EDIT- Alot of times, on deltas. It says server.java/shophandle.java all that… but when i went to client.java(lol) and added a } after a command. it all went away… lol it lies. so wacht go to the last thing u fixed/edited/added b4 u got that error.

Read full topic
